Actually, I'm going to fulfill my own request lol. Managed to find them in some obscure DD page (some of the issues were also available in very old 0-day packs from ShipJ, but unfortunately without seeds).

good work! certain torrent sites return search results of individual comic titles, not just the torrent title. that's often helpful. i'd refer you to a good one, but the system here thinks that's a bad idea.

Let's do something then, contact me on this email:
